website_summaries.verdict: Fixed lens camera with a large 50X optical zoom lens that brings far-off subjects closer.
pros: Can record images at a resolution up to 20.4 megapixels
Having a 50X optical zoom lens is a great feature when shooting nature photos
Includes a tiltable LCD screen that allows you to shoot odd-angle photographs
Can record images in burst mode at up to 10 frames per second
cons: Image quality lags behind DSLR and mirrorless style digital cameras

website_summaries.verdict: It can't match some of its competition in the features department, but the Sony Cyber-shot HX300 still packs a powerful zoom lens and plenty of point-and-shoot punch.
pros: The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX300 has strong image stabilization to back up its 50x zoom lens
excellent picture quality for its class
and a large assortment of shooting options for all levels of photographers
cons: The HX300's 20-megapixel sensor doesn't translate into better picture quality
It doesn't have a hot shoe, GPS, or Wi-Fi built in

customer_reviews.title: 2nd review
customer_reviews.text: I wrote this huge long detailed review only to receive an email that it was not submitted because it violated the guidelines (which it did not). So here's my 2nd review.. if you want a good camera but you're not ready for a dslr, you can't go wrong with this one. I included a shot of the moon I took yesterday (10-2-17) at 100x zoom and no tripod or anything to steady my hand. This is a great camera.
customer_reviews.author: S Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, but be sure to buy the extended warranty!  Error code E:62:10.
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these and loved them from the day I received them, so why not give a 5-star rating. Simple. They both now flash an error message "E:62:10" on the screen. Based on my telephoto pictures, I think it means that the autofocus or auto tracking isn't working. Error code came up only 5 months after purchase, but too late to return as defective. $150 to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Alaskaguy

customer_reviews.title: Allows full manual focus and great LCD screen
customer_reviews.text: The Carl Zeiss lens is as advertised and the LCD tilt screen is easy to use and view. The manual focus in combination with this lens drew me to this camera. It is compact and lightweight and easy to shoot rapidly. Great quality used with no scratches on the lens or body. They even included a new free 16GB SD micro card.
customer_reviews.author: Kim B. Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but I'm not getting the quality I had hoped for with telephoto. Update to my original review. Early 2018 the camera had a major problem. I was getting an error message that would not go away. Found out there is a problem with the flex connector and it fails after time. This is not an uncommon problem with this camera as well as the newer version. Do your research. Many people are having problems. Cost to fix is about equal to the cost of a new camera.
customer_reviews.author: D. Strong

customer_reviews.title: It is bigger than the other models of Cyber-shots and so doesn't fit comfortably in my hand
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Cyber-shot I have bought. I just got this one and took it out of the box so haven't taken any pics yet. It is bigger than the other models of Cyber-shots and so doesn't fit comfortably in my hand. Also there is no memory stick in the package. The battery charger does not allow you to put the battery in the charger. It requires you to leave battery in camera and connect by cable to wall charger----not convenient at all. My other models allowed me to put battery in charger without having to look for a cable.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie J. Mazur

customer_reviews.title: This camera is awesome
customer_reviews.text: This camera is awesome. It takes great pictures for a point/shoot. Even fully zoomed in at the insane 50x optical zoom this camera takes great, clear pictures. I've gotten shots that would never have been possible otherwise. I prefer using this type of camera over any DSLR/interchangeable lens camera (especially when out hiking). It's just so much more versatile. There's tons of features on the camera as well, but I wanted to stress the quality of photos it takes as my main point. I'd recommend this camera for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: great camera. quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: great camera. quick shipping, exactly as ordered, and I love it. I use it much more than the professional camera I have. The 400 also has GPS, which I would have gotten if it had been available when I ordered this camera. nevertheless, Sony has a real winner here. The 50X optical is wonderful. It enabled me to stand at Glacier Point and get very good pictures of people climbing Half-Dome. Also, the battery life is very good. I can get ~2 hours of video on a single battey, and with a 64GB card, i can get a huge number of high-resolution pics and video.
customer_reviews.author: John3

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: easy to use, great pics, great HD video. Love the panoramic feature. also really like the Super Auto function to help me with action shots. Novice photographer so still learning the camera and how to take better pictures. Fits well in one hand and tilt LCD screen can be helpful. recommend the Sony LCJ-HL/B jacket case with hand strap to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: IAIN C

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for the Mid-level Photographer.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this camera. I also have a Canon Rebel (entry level) and I have to haul around a lot of equipment to get just a fraction of the zooming capability of this camera. The on screen help screens are really nice. The time between pressing the shutter and the picture capture is very fast. I haven't had a chance to compare the quality of the digital captures between the 2 DSLR's I own but so far I'm extremely happy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: R. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have to ask and change my opinión about the camera, and need help to know what is wrong, the camera or the new Sony SD 32 GB card . It's the 3rd time, I take a lot of pictures, let's say 150 shots and when I go to daowload them to the PC, there are only 50 shots visible, and the rest can't be opened. The program can't reconigze the tool to open, so they appear as a blank square. I'm very sad with this because they are family potos tan can't recover. Any help?
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalo

customer_reviews.title: FAST DELIVERY HOWEVER - WRONG VERSION RECEIVED AND TROUBLE REGISTERING FOR SONY WARRANTY.
customer_reviews.text: 5 Stars for Fast Delivery, HOWEVER.... What I received was a Europeon version of the camera NOT North American so I'm not sure where this stock came from or what the difference is. For the cost I paid I would have appreciated a North American product. Also I had trouble registering the product with Sony Canada as that is where I reside. I had to register with Sony USA. I will most likely have issues when I require warranty. I'm sure it will have to involve a trip across the border into Washington State to mail and receive back the camera. That is really inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is my go to no frills camera
customer_reviews.text: A perfect "Go to" camera for hiking. High image quality with nice Zeiss lens and Sony imaging. Has fixed super zoom lens so no fumbling with lens during shooting fast situations.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.

customer_reviews.title: ... a year now and the video it takes is fantastic..
customer_reviews.text: I've had the Sony for about a year now and the video it takes is fantastic...I shoot mostly video and I snap a photo while the video is running...I always get a good photo that way....The steady shot is great too..I walk around taking video and it stays real steady...Way to go Sony...
customer_reviews.author: Misterbob

customer_reviews.title: Another Excellent Cyber-Shot Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I'm enjoying my newest Sony Cyber-shot. I think I have owned 3 or 4 of the various Cyber-shots over the years, and Sony has become my go-to camera maker. I much prefer the colors and zoom options with Sony vs. comparable Canons or Nikons.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Belle

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Excellent zoom, sharp images, great camera, low price. Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: C. F.

customer_reviews.title: Super camera. Could not be more pleased
customer_reviews.text: Super camera. Could not be more pleased. Super zoom is excellent. Just got back from great smokey mountains to see rhe Fall colors. Camera and I took great shots.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Liking the Sony Cyber-shot HX300 50 Optical
customer_reviews.text: It took a bit to like this camera...I was so use to using a Canon SX50. Overall, a good camera. It seems a little slower than the canon but the images are pretty good. I am quite pleased as evident by the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Marian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera for nature photos.
customer_reviews.text: This camera has many options and talents. I am very pleased to have this tool. Hope to use for more nature pictures. Well worth the cost, in that is has been re-built and was on discount. Appreciated the price also.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Wehner

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for my wife. She has a obvious tremor in her hands (has to hold a coffee cup with both hands) so the image stabilization was a must. Her hobby is posting flower pictures on line. Two professional photographers have asked what camera she uses. Some of her fans think she is a professional but she only shoots in full auto mode. It is truly one of the best cameras in its class and ten some.
customer_reviews.author: Evert Mcdowell

customer_reviews.title: we love it. we have used it for birthday pictures ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and it has been close to a year now. she loves it. its being used almost 3-4 times a week. I am now getting my parts and add ons for this camera. we love it. we have used it for birthday pictures to the random moment in out lives with the kids. loves.
customer_reviews.author: danyael_13

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. See photo of how the picture quality is so good, that the picture magnified of the dog's eye with the camera shows my reflection taking the picture.
customer_reviews.author: phylsmith2004

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: OMG, I love this camera! Simple to use, lightweight and fantastic quality photos!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: MAKE SURE YOUR CAMERA IS BRAND NEW
customer_reviews.text: I have owned three of these if they are brand new and well taken care of BEST CAMERAS EVER, buying used is not good, if I could buy a few more of these New never used I would in a HEARTBEAT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Review of Sony DSc-HX300
customer_reviews.text: I do love this camera with the 50x zoom and so lightweight. I am going to take it traveling and leaving my heavy Canon at home. I have lots of great wildlife shots already so very happy with this lens. Thank you! M. Barbe'
customer_reviews.author: MARYLE BARBE

customer_reviews.title: amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I already owned a Sony Cyber-Shot 20X zoom. I really loved it, but wanted a bit more"zoom" So, since I was familiar with the Sony I decided on the 50X zoom. WOW!!!!!! It is so cool!!!! It has features on it that i did not know it had, so many options !!! Watercolor, B&W, Sepia,one feature makes things look like a coloring book!!!! I LOVE THIS CAMERA!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Brown

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I sold my Nikon DSLR for this and ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I sold my Nikon DSLR for this and everything seems to be good. Image quality and zoom are amazing. It also has very good stabilization in the videos.
customer_reviews.author: Corey H.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I swear by Sony cameras. This is as good as expected and easy to use. I have many beautiful photos taken with this camera
customer_reviews.author: Amy S Conder

customer_reviews.title: Poor choice for action shots...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this camera. I had previously used an HX200V and figured this would be similar but it's not. Regardless of the settings, this camera is SLOW. I have missed so many shots waiting on this camera to either take the shot or to finish writing the photo I took before it. The images displayed on the screen often appear to be really clear and detailed but once you open them on a laptop, you realize just how bad the photos actually are. I have just printed my return label as this camera just really doesn't live up to the expectations I had for it
customer_reviews.author: TheMulkMrs

customer_reviews.title: Love this Camera!
customer_reviews.text: It takes great pictures even in high zoom and low lighting. I am very pleased with this camera and look forward to learning how to use the other functions available on it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ellibee

customer_reviews.title: Best photos I've ever taken
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera after reading tons of reviews, and have been thrilled with it. I took it to my recent trip to Europe and the photos I took with it are amazing. Originally I was hoping to replace my Canon Super zoom with a lighter model--that didn't happen--they are about the same size and weight. What sold me on this camera was its zoom ability, it's stabilizer (more and more important since I'm aging and have a slight tremor now), and the fact that it had a viewfinder. I could never get used to not using a viewfinder. So even though it's a bit chunky and heavier than those cute pocket cameras, I made the right choice for me.
customer_reviews.author: NRV

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent camera that has all the integral features to make a person challenge himself to be a better photographer while not having to think too much in the process!
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. One of the best cameras for the price I have ever had. Pictures come out great and very easy menu to follow.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaMartinsen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and Awesome Pictures
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful pictures and the zoom is awesome. No need to be changing lenses. Great buy. Ised at my daughters college graduation and the pics were fantastic !!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, awesome camera. I'm still learning all of the features, but so far it is fantastic. My daughter has this same camera and just loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Really love this camera. I took pictures of the moon that were amazing. You could see detail like you were looking through a telescope.
customer_reviews.author: Melodyf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the ease of this camera and the pictures are crisp and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Super for the non snooty photographer.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one and liked it so much I bought my best friend one.
customer_reviews.author: FLC

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera. I was worried that the pictures taken with the extreme zoom would not be good quality. No worries now, all the pictures turn out fantastic. It is a good camera for those like me who are wanting more than just a point and shoot but not ready to take the plunge buying an SLR camera.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hoerman

customer_reviews.title: Great cam
customer_reviews.text: All about the zoom and getting close to wildlife. Lots of features, good build quality, great viewfinder and video, Great color, only thing I wish it had GPS. (Update) I have been able to take 50x shots hand held that are sharp, but a monopod works great. Hand held twilight mode is very good for low light shots and Sony's HDR implementation is one of the best if you use a tripod.
customer_reviews.author: Kjaay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great camera, so fast with so many options. great photos.
customer_reviews.author: fairy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Finally can get good pics at night like the moon and sky etc.
customer_reviews.author: John A Dular

customer_reviews.title: Wildlife  guy Dr Rudy
customer_reviews.text: Simply put great all around camera .i have a plus 5k canon system and this little package except for a few minor applications holds its own
customer_reviews.author: Rudy lessing This is price gouging or retail arbitrage

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Best all around camera for macro to long range. About one pound in weight but packed with outstanding features. Already taken fantastic pictures.
customer_reviews.author: fred

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. More than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. More than I expected. It has so many functions that you may not have to use the retouching programs. The Zoom is awesome !!
customer_reviews.author: D. G.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: More than I expected. I am a point-and-shoot person. I take many pics on my job and I've only had a couple of bad shots. Excellent low light shots. Great zoom too. Took HD video of my granddaughter's Christmas play from the back row - couldn't tell it was a distance shot. I did buy a new lens cap with a tether cord. The one out of the box does not have a tether cord.
customer_reviews.author: Bturner7

customer_reviews.title: HX 300/B Sony cyber-shot camera
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding build and picture quality. Be careful the HX 200 is much smaller by comparison and the new "Hang Down Hand Grip case for both is too large for the 200 and too small for the 300 model. The HX 200 may be sold out. I have a Canon 5D Mark II $3000 camera to compare and pictures are hard to differentiate.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Dubiel

customer_reviews.title: Best point & shoot camera!
customer_reviews.text: Best camera I ever had. Great zoom! Great overall features! I'll buy it again No complainants Even better than some expensive "pros" dslr
customer_reviews.author: Guadalupe MataCruz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great all-purpose camera. It is well made and has a good feel.
customer_reviews.author: John Milby

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I love my Sony! Produces great photos. Fits comfortably in my hand. I love the ease of use. I love the depth of photos produced. I recommend this camera for the novice who wants to move from point and click to the world of true artistic photography.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Berg

customer_reviews.title: Used, box-stuffed, and still okay.
customer_reviews.text: Prelim look at most of the camera functions seems okay so far. I will update this review if things change. I bought this item used and the shipper had put it in a box a quarter of an inch too small to contain it. Thus I received a box with a dome-like bulge on one end of it, where the retracted lens was pushing up. Yikes! Seems however that Santa's little packages flew so fast on their reindeer that no boxed item had a chance to be up against another one long enough to receive any damaging pressure this Christmas. Merry-merry to me. Good thing. :)
customer_reviews.author: AlexTheGreat

customer_reviews.title: Camera as described
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this camera and I really like the pictures it takes. Although the camera was used it didn't have any scratches on lens or body. I received the camera as described.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo R.

customer_reviews.title: Very good step up from iphone photography
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lighter-weight good camera than my older Nikon. This one has many wonderful features, although you do need to spend time studying the manual. I took it to Italy and was able to zoom to some great shots in the pre-Alps, like a Palladio villa from quite far away. I have more to learn, but at about 1.5 pounds, it is quite easy to carry and takes better photos than my iphone.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Sacksteder

customer_reviews.title: My first $200+ camera
customer_reviews.text: This is my first $200+ camera. Take great pictures. The only issue I have is that it takes a while to load. it could be the settings, but overall it is a great camera.
customer_reviews.author: MasterP

customer_reviews.title: it takes little time to happen but not like same time as soon as push and people ask ...
customer_reviews.text: Hello, When I'm trying to shoot, it takes little time to happen but not like same time as soon as push and people ask me what is wrong with your camera, why is camera delay for shoot. It's possible to fix through to setting , so please advise. If your suggestion going to be option that has many shots in same time, it's not which I need. I talking about standard single shots which has delay issue.
customer_reviews.author: Rahim

customer_reviews.title: My companion
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot and needed a camera that was light and with a good telescopic lens. This camera allows me to take nature and landscape in great ways. It is a trustworthy partner for photo shoots.
customer_reviews.author: kei izawa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing Camera. Nothing like I experienced before. No blurry or unfocused pictures. The zoom is just incredible. The video HD quality is superb. Very smooth playback on my quad core HP. The only complaint which really has no impact on the performance of the camera but I wish that the software installation process was less time consuming for the video portion and DVD burning. All in all I am extremely happy especially since I have started using the camera on 3-15-2013 and people that pre-ordered this camera directly from the Sony site paid more money and are still waiting for the camera. Amazon rules.
customer_reviews.author: Franz

customer_reviews.title: wow very nice
customer_reviews.text: The camera part of this one is very excitting to use on the intelligent Auto function. I havent had so much fun from a camera like this in a while. I have been using Canon POwershot for many reason but my problem was low lighting video recording. However, I still need to figure out the video recording since I am getting linear and pixelating images in a few seconds of recording. It doesnt happpen all the time and so I dont know what is causing it so far. Its a good weight for me since my right hand shakes , I like the floating effect of the video so there is hardly any shakes.
customer_reviews.author: ai chan1

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is easy to use and produces some of the clearest macro, telephoto, and landscape shots I have ever taken. If you are into macro or telephoto photography I would highly recommend this camera. I own a Pentax DSLR Kr and the Sony DSC-HX300 takes better photos. Takes macro shots better than my Pentax DSLR and I am so glad that I purchased this camera. It is worth every cent. I will upload some my shots.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Breakable and not as good a deal as the HX-100
customer_reviews.text: This camera only lasted me 6 months before it got all glitchy and sad. All in all I was very disappointed in it. The version with 30x zoom is much better in overall quality. Whatever you do, don't buy one of these without investing in insurance.
customer_reviews.author: E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've had it two years and yesterday it failed. Don't know why yet, we'll see about customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compare with its previous model,  SONY DSC-HX300B performs everything much better except its size and no auto viewer slection.
customer_reviews.text: THis camera is fantastic especially it long zoom lens. It meet all my expectation and the only comments at two areas. 1) Compared with it previous version DSC-HX100, it is much bigger at every dimensions.and no longer consider as a compact camera.. 2) On the previous model ,DSC-HX100, there is an electornic sensor that senses any covering over the eye piece and itautomatically switch the display between the verwfinder and the LCD screen. It is a nice feature and it is no available on the new DSC-HX300. On the DSC-HX300, it is required to manually select which viewer to display the image.
customer_reviews.author: H. Cheung

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I have been a Sony freak all along and what impresses me most I think about their products is all the different opinions that they create. I would think it's either a decent camera or it's not. All digital cameras will do what they are designed to do and you can pay any price you want to pay but albeit a dslr or compact, it still boils down to whose hands it is in.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R. Poteet

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use and excellent for amateur (me) photographer. No complains so far. It ia advised to buy the jacket for the easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Nino bras

customer_reviews.title: New Sony Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first Sony camera, Carl Zeiss lens, in 2007 to take continuous photos of my children's track team. The pictures were outstanding and the camera lasted until fall 2013. I replaced it with this Sony and I am even happier. The manual focus is much easier, the 50x zoom is great, and the photos are beautiful. Do spend $7 and get a lens cap with an attachment string. Really, Sony? You couldn't include that?
customer_reviews.author: TripleToys

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought the camera from Amazon and I bought a VCT-VPR1 Remote Control Tripod from Sony to go with it. I highly recommend that you buy both as it is much easier to focus on distant objects with the remote and take pictures without moving the camera. I have taken great shots of the moon and Jupiter with its moons. I use the camera mostly for birds and scenery shots and I am extremely pleased with all my pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Galloway

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Camera!! No Problems here.
customer_reviews.text: Sony DSC-HX300/B 20 MP Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Very Good Camera!! No Problems here. Love the 50X zoom perfect for sporting events/vacation photo's
customer_reviews.author: japrosse

customer_reviews.title: Sony camera from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great if you want to take great snapshots. It will not give you professional results if you are wanting enlarged photos.This camera is great if you simply want to take pictures to enjoy. This camera will disappoint you if you are wanting to take photos that look like magazine covers. A very good camera. Better than any other in its class for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Received the product, but some accessories were missing
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product, but I received it missing some accessories as the rechargeable battery, the USB and charge cable and the protection lens strip.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Azevedo Dotto

customer_reviews.title: Great advanced camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for people who want good quality pictures without the expense and weight of the SLRs. If I had a complaint at all, it would be the lens cover does have a strap to keep it attached to the camera. I am always afraid I'll loose it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would rather have my 200 back.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the HX300 to replace my 200 that I left on an airplane. I like this camera, but to use the zoom at 50 definitely requires a tripod, whereas I could use the 200 fully zoomed out without a tripod. Consequently, the quality of my photos were, I felt, superior to those that I get with this camera. Given the choice, I would rather have my 200 back.
customer_reviews.author: David Ross

customer_reviews.title: I love Sony Cameras
customer_reviews.text: I -and got one for friend- We just enjoy having fun and taken pics- We also have the HX 200V cameras-Both cameras are great-
customer_reviews.author: RUSS

customer_reviews.title: Enigma in a box!
customer_reviews.text: Set up was difficult and not well laid out in materials. Saving grace was in camera manual which got me through some of the difficult settings. The ia settings work very well and the quality in bright light is very good. Wished the lcd screen turned inward as I do not use it for framing. Fun camera but tricky at times.
customer_reviews.author: lynnie

customer_reviews.title: Could have more accessories
customer_reviews.text: In the general, it is good. However, there are not a few accessories as: Tripod, cords (mainly) and SD Card. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Pires Leandro

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this camera to become available. I currently shoot with a sony DSLR, but I wanted something to take with me when I didn't want all my lenses. It just came last night so I didn't get to use it much. The tilting ability of the LCD is an awesome feature. Lots of bells and whistles, but it is crazy to see the zoom lens seem to come out of nowhere in this device. I know some of the reviews state that it is heavy, but being used to the sony dslr, this seems to be the perfect weight. I wanted something substantial for control, but not heavy to hold. Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Wrede

customer_reviews.title: Changes Were Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: I currently own the HX200 and LOVE it but wanted more zoom. I was disappointed with the changes made to the HX300. There is no securing strap for the lens cap. I also did not like that you could not have the LCD/finder on at the same time. The picture taking ability seemed equal or better than the 200 but the hassle of the other changes made the use of the camera frustrating for me. Unfortunately I returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: L. Spade

customer_reviews.title: Sony made this? Returned
customer_reviews.text: Well, I couldn't believe after having Sony cameras for over 15 years that this was camera actually made by Sony. Poor quality pictures, mostly blurry if any action. I returned this camera.
customer_reviews.author: LuckyFeather

customer_reviews.title: Opened box, lens cover was off of lens. ...
customer_reviews.text: Opened box, lens cover was off of lens.....concerning but lens seemed ok. LCD worked, viewfinder did not, and large selector knob was broken. I paid for a fully functioning camera and did not get one. I also paid a lot of money. I am hoping I can return it but I may be past the 30 day mark.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is just ok! I was disappointed in it! Although it has good tele lens, it is not a very easy camera to use! I would not recommend it. It is over priced for the kind of camera it is!
customer_reviews.author: Albert C. Marth

customer_reviews.title: SONY HLEP
customer_reviews.text: I CANT TRANSFER PICS TO SONY PS3 THE 800 NUMBER NO HELP YOU HAVE TO HANG ON FOR 30 MIN
customer_reviews.author: Mohan

product_meta.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX300/BC 20.4 MP Digital Camera with 50x Optical Zoom and 3-Inch Xtra Fine LCD (Black)
product_meta.description:
Capture landscapes with one touch using Sweep Panorama, get that perfect portrait with Smile Shutter, snap wider scenes Input Output Terminals: Hi-Speed USB (USB 2.0), Micro HDMI, Multi USB

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 A+ DSCHX300B 





See details you never knew existed with an astoundingly clear 50x zoom, making close-ups more interesting. Imagine tight shots of the lead singer in concert, or the expression on your favorite athlete’s face at the game. Best of all, the action stays clear and stable even when you’re fully zoomed. 50x optical zoom plus 100x Clear Image
Digital Zoom Optical SteadyShot® image stabilization with 3-way active mode³ 20.4MP images and 
high speed AF even
in low-light 
Technology Super 50x zoom Zoom in incredibly close for awesome sports, travel, and wildlife photos. The HX300 boasts 50x optical zoom plus 100x Clear Image Digital Zoom technology to bring you near enough to capture elated smiles on the sports field. A powerful processor reduces graininess for crisper, higher-quality close-ups. Say goodbye to blur Optical SteadyShot® image stabilization reduces shake and blur by countering camera movements in both horizontal and vertical directions.³ Active 3-Way stabilization adds digital rolling control that counters clockwise and anti-clockwise rotation, resulting in more stable videos even at long focal lengths. Pixel Power With a 20.4-megapixel Exmor® R CMOS sensor, capture high-resolution images that take full advantage of the camera's high quality Carl Zeiss® lens. Advanced processing technology reduces noise and graininess for incredibly crisp, clear images - even in challenging low-light conditions. Amazing HD movies Record crystal-clear movies at the highest resolution available with Full HD 1080/60p video capture1. Stunning, fast motion video with reduced distortion looks great when played back on your HDTV2. Notice a perfect photo opp while shooting video? With dual record of stills and movies, you can shoot both at the same time. Overhead of the crowd The tiltable 3" LCD makes it easy to reach above a crowd to take great shots with an interesting overhead perspective. Since you can angle the LCD so it's facing towards you, you'll be able to frame the shot exactly as you want. It's also convenient for shooting subjects situated at a low angle - snapping photos of children at their eye level. Never miss the moment Capture full 20.4 megapixel resolution images at up to 10 frames per second, helping to ensure that the decisive moment is captured such as the soccer ball flying into the goal. In addition, a mechanical shutter helps reduce distortion when continuously shooting moving subjects. 
Product description and full feature list Explore the full range of features and options below. 
Intelligent Sweep Panorama™
mode-up to 360°
Intelligent Sweep Panorama mode takes our Sweep Panorama function to the next level with the addition of motion compensation. Even when subjects are moving in the foreground of your landscape, these cameras can detect faces and moving subjects, intelligently stitching different widths together to minimize distortion. Simply press the shutter button and sweep the camera in the desired direction and the camera continuously shoots at a high speed, then seamlessly stitches the images together with automatic position adjustment to create one stunning panoramic image. Available in wide and up to 360° full circle, the camera can take a variety of panoramic shots.



Picture Effects
Picture Effect adds a new level of expression to photos, making ordinary landscapes and portraits come to life by heightening mood and emphasizing certain attributes. There are nine different effects such as partial color to make your focal point stand out, or watercolor which looks like a painting.

Enhanced Superior Auto
Enhanced Superior Auto supports scenes with dynamic motion to provide beautiful results even in dark situations. The result is clearer images with less blur.



Advanced Flash illuminates distant subjects for beautifully lit photos
Advanced Flash allows you to shoot bright, beautifully lit photos even when zooming. The built in flash reaches farther resulting in brighter subjects in dimly lit rooms or outdoors in the evening.




1. Records in 29 minute segments

2. Requires HDTV and HDMI cable sold separately

3. Combined with electronic stabilization
